org.waarp.common.file

Interface DirInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FtpDir
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDir, CommonDirImpl, FileBasedDir, FileBasedDir, FilesystemBasedDirImpl, FilesystemBasedFtpDir, R66Dir

    public interface DirInterface
    Interface for Directory support

             throws CommandAbstractException

        Returns:

        CommandAbstractException

      • getDigest

        byte[] getDigest(String path,
                 String algo)
          throws CommandAbstractException
        Get the Digest of the given FileInterface
        Parameters:
        path -
        algo - algorithm of Digest among CRC32, ADLER32, MD5, MD2, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512

        the Digest
        Throws:
        CommandAbstractException
